title: Palm Down Hand Dark Skin Tone

adjectives: Can be a firm signal of halt.
verbs: Used for giving encouragement or stopping action.
nouns: Represents an offering of support or a gesture of peace.

description: A hand with the palm facing down and fingers spread, often used to convey a stop gesture, a high five, or a sense of openness and welcome.
apple_vendor_description: The palm-down hand emoji on Apple devices showcases a rich, deep ebony skin tone rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading. Its surface exhibits smooth gradients and realistic lighting, giving it a tactile, polished appearance with softly rounded edges. This emoji is commonly used to convey 'stop,' 'halt,' 'wait a moment,' or a gentle dismissal, projecting a sense of calm authority and clear communication on Apple devices.
